feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Snow early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 early this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
